publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman says:

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman says:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: the attempt to learn about things (typically from a teacher) study; the pursuit of intellectual/moral self-development; learning

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: desist, give it a break; stop at a certain point, leave it at that, leave things as they are and do nothing about them

tls:text.tls:line: As for blue, one takes it from the indigo plant,

sense.def: 取諸其懷to take (a certain amount or part N1) (from a whole or a place N2), to pick out (something N1) (from a larger group N2)

tls:text.tls:line: As for blue, one takes it from the indigo plant,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: but it is bluer than the indigo plant.

sense.def: but, and yet

tls:text.tls:line: but it is bluer than the indigo plant.

sense.def: indigo plant

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: ice; layer of ice; iced water

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: water

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: constitute, produce something by transforming to it

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: but, and yet

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: be colder than N

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: water

tls:text.tls:line: A piece of wood may be straight to fit the plumbline,

sense.def: piece of timber, piece of wood

tls:text.tls:line: A piece of wood may be straight to fit the plumbline,

sense.def: be straight and unwarped, not bent, not crooked

tls:text.tls:line: so that its roundness fits the compass.

sense.def: X is a general feature of PRO. 修其孝悌忠信"cultivate their filial and fraternal love, the loyality and trustworthiness"

tls:text.tls:line: so that its roundness fits the compass.

sense.def: roundness

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: imitate

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: the right person (for a typically important task or purpose)

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: current practice

tls:text.tls:line: and the explanations of the gentleman

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: and the explanations of the gentleman

sense.def: detailed explanation; satisfactory explanation; doctrine, thesis; discourse

tls:text.tls:line: then one will become honoured and as a result widely known,

sense.def: be appreciated; be highly esteemed; be highly valued

tls:text.tls:line: then one will become honoured and as a result widely known,

sense.def: ＝遍 become famous everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: and then one will be ever-present in one's generation.

sense.def: one's own generation

tls:text.tls:line: and then one will be ever-present in one's generation.

sense.def: permeate throughout 周於

tls:text.tls:line: one should not tell him;

sense.def: pass on the determinate information to the determinate audience

tls:text.tls:line: if someone informs on indecorous matters,

sense.def: what is indecorous; what is uncouth; what is evil

tls:text.tls:line: one should not ask questions of him;

sense.def: ask the contextually determinate person N1 questions concerning the topic N2

tls:text.tls:line: only then should one receive him,

sense.def: receive somebody

tls:text.tls:line: To get it wrong one time,

sense.def: one time; for the first time; once (a day)

tls:text.tls:line: To get it wrong one time,

sense.def: at one time... at another time

tls:text.tls:line: and to get it right the next time,

sense.def: at one time... at another time

tls:text.tls:line: that is the way of the man in the street.

sense.def: ordinary street

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are good are few,

sense.def: be in the minority (perhaps vt( prep N "be fewer than the contextually determinate N)

tls:text.tls:line: those who are not good are in the majority:

sense.def: be in the majority (as compared to the contextually determinate N)

tls:text.tls:line: those who are not good are in the majority:

sense.def: the bad, the wicked

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: control (perhaps prototypically water and rivers; breath, emotions, or the mind), order properly, deal with efficiently

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: inner mental energies of a person; vital energies in a person

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: cultivate (a mentality, connections etc)

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: proper technique, proper method

tls:text.tls:line: how could he achieve that?

sense.def: achieve the contextually determiante N

tls:text.tls:line: (That standard) is suitable for timely success/

sense.def: be appropriate for

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: be located in (a place); find oneself in (a condition, at a time); occupy (a position or an office); place oneself (in a position or place)

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: SHI: state of destitution

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: be advantageous; be profitable, be advisable

tls:text.tls:line: That (standard) is ritual propriety and good faith.

sense.def: ritual propriety, the rules and principles of ritual propriety; the demands of ritual

tls:text.tls:line: That (standard) is ritual propriety and good faith.

sense.def: credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: conform, align oneself with

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: goodness of attitude; moral goodness

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: be in harmony with; comply nicely with; stay in harmony with;

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: lead; German: mit gutem Beispiel vorangehen

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: sycophancy through words or action

tls:text.tls:line: and none more intelligent than unifying one's likes.

sense.def: be supernatural, divine, numinous; divinely efficient; be possessed of supernatural powers; occasionally used in a derived transitive sense

tls:text.tls:line: and none more intelligent than unifying one's likes.

sense.def: likes, preferences

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: orientations and thoughts

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: be refined and beautiful 甚修

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: be arrogant towards> proudly look down upon

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: wealth and nobility

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: serious; endowed with social weight; act with conviction; have the courage of one's convictions

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: moral orientation

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: make light of; think little of; be not afraid of; to slight, hold in disrespect, to fail to show the proper respect for (the law etc)

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: kingship and dukedom

tls:text.tls:line: Absorbed in the examination of his inner self, he will scorn mere external things.

sense.def: external things

tls:text.tls:line: but it bends to become a wheel

sense.def: bend

tls:text.tls:line: but it bends to become a wheel

sense.def: object marker: 把它

tls:text.tls:line: but it bends to become a wheel

sense.def: make/produce (physically), construct build (a platform, a house)

tls:text.tls:line: The fact that even if (suīyǒu) it is dried out in the sun

sense.def: even if

tls:text.tls:line: it will not be straightened out again

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: it will not be straightened out again

sense.def: again (as in 復戰 "fight again, renew battle".(often of reverting to an original state:) again (失而復得"lose but regain again") occasionally and rarely adversative: on the contrary; (with negatives, not) any more, not any longer; but again

tls:text.tls:line: is an effect of the bending.

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: is an effect of the bending.

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: is an effect of the bending.

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: is an effect of the bending.

sense.def: happen, be so

tls:text.tls:line: Thus timber, if cut according to the plumbline, will be straight,

sense.def: and so, so; singnalling another step in argumentation, with a hardly perceivable causal meaning or without any at all

tls:text.tls:line: Thus timber, if cut according to the plumbline, will be straight,

sense.def: piece of timber, piece of wood

tls:text.tls:line: Thus timber, if cut according to the plumbline, will be straight,

sense.def: ink-line; [MOVE THE EXAMPLES FOR THIS: sometimes intransferred sense: the legal ink-line, the line where the permissible ends and the unpermissible begins]

tls:text.tls:line: Thus timber, if cut according to the plumbline, will be straight,

sense.def: receive (worship etc) (Note the link to the passive constructions with this verb!)

tls:text.tls:line: metal, if the whetst one is applied to it, will be sharp.

sense.def: piece of metal

tls:text.tls:line: metal, if the whetst one is applied to it, will be sharp.

sense.def: then (after S)

tls:text.tls:line: If the gentleman will study broadly

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; work to improve oneself morally/intellectually

tls:text.tls:line: and every day he keeps investigating himself,

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:line: then his awareness will be clear,

sense.def: be good at seeing things, be visually talented> be intelligent; be perspicacious, be enlightened

tls:text.tls:line: then his awareness will be clear,

sense.def: then, at that time specified in the preceding (often minor) sentence

tls:text.tls:line: and his actions will be without inadvertent transgressions.

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:line: and his actions will be without inadvertent transgressions.

sense.def: xìng: professional conduct, public demeanour, public conduct; personal conduct, behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: and his actions will be without inadvertent transgressions.

sense.def: lack, be without; make do without; imply no (harm or loss); lack the support of (subordinates)

tls:text.tls:line: and his actions will be without inadvertent transgressions.

sense.def: going too far> transgression

tls:text.tls:line: and his actions will be without inadvertent transgressions.

sense.def: final particle after a conditional clause!

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, if one does not climb a high mountain,

sense.def: and so, so; singnalling another step in argumentation, with a hardly perceivable causal meaning or without any at all

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, if one does not climb a high mountain,

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, if one does not climb a high mountain,

sense.def: mountain of rock; mountain (occasionally not of rock, and even man-made)

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: the sky

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: great height; highness

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: final particle marking non-narrative judgemental statements

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the height of the sky;

sense.def: NP2 is a feature or characteristic of NP1 父之道

tls:text.tls:line: if one does not personally get into a deep gully (xī)

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: if one does not personally get into a deep gully (xī)

sense.def: move (often downwards) towards, approach (and arrive at); be situated close to JIA YI, "Mourning Qu Yuan": 命臨沒 "When life is about to come to an end".

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the thickness of the earth;

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the thickness of the earth;

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the thickness of the earth;

sense.def: the earth, the ground

tls:text.tls:line: one will not understand the thickness of the earth;

sense.def: NP2 is a feature or characteristic of NP1 父之道

tls:text.tls:line: if one has not heard-and-learnt the transmitted words of the former kings

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: if one has not heard-and-learnt the transmitted words of the former kings

sense.def: NP1 is the source of NP2 雍之言

tls:text.tls:line: if one has not heard-and-learnt the transmitted words of the former kings

sense.def: word; sentence; doctrine as expressed in words

tls:text.tls:line: one does not understand the magnitude of study and inquiry.

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: one does not understand the magnitude of study and inquiry.

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: one does not understand the magnitude of study and inquiry.

sense.def: NP2 is a feature or characteristic of NP1 父之道

tls:text.tls:line: one does not understand the magnitude of study and inquiry.

sense.def: final particle marking non-narrative judgemental statements

tls:text.tls:line: The children of Wu and Yue, the Yi and the Mo

sense.def: NP2 is a subcategory or kind of NY1 知之次

tls:text.tls:line: make the same noises when they are born

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:text.tls:line: make the same noises when they are born

sense.def: after Ving, then 生而知之"knows things from birth"

tls:text.tls:line: but as they grow up they have different customs.

sense.def: grow; grow up properly; grow up to be adult; (of abilities) grow to get stronger, develop;

tls:text.tls:line: but as they grow up they have different customs.

sense.def: at that point in time, then

tls:text.tls:line: but as they grow up they have different customs.

sense.def: current local custom; temporary habit

tls:text.tls:line: Instruction brings this about.

sense.def: training; drill; moral instruction; instruction

tls:text.tls:line: Instruction brings this about.

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: Instruction brings this about.

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: Instruction brings this about.

sense.def: happen, be so

tls:text.tls:line: Instruction brings this about.

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: The Songs [207] say:

sense.def: the Book of Songs

tls:text.tls:line: The Songs [207] say:

sense.def: one says; you say; it is said, as in 故曰 "thus it is said", German: "Daher heisst es..." cf. MO 於《武觀》曰："In the Wǔguān IT says..." 於《仲虺之告》曰： 於先王之書《仲虺之告》曰：

tls:text.tls:line: "Oh, you gentlemen,

sense.def: alas!

tls:text.tls:line: "Oh, you gentlemen,

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:text.tls:line: "Oh, you gentlemen,

sense.def: You!

tls:text.tls:line: do not constantly relax and rest.

sense.def: relax, take a rest

tls:text.tls:line: Be poised and respectful in your positions

sense.def: approach earnestly and with full respect

tls:text.tls:line: Be poised and respectful in your positions

sense.def: your

tls:text.tls:line: Be poised and respectful in your positions

sense.def: one's concrete rank in the hierarchy; respectable formal position in society

tls:text.tls:line: and be fond of those who are correct and straight.

sense.def: prefer; show a preference for

tls:text.tls:line: and be fond of those who are correct and straight.

sense.def: this (abstract) N

tls:text.tls:line: and be fond of those who are correct and straight.

sense.def: proper straightness, upright straightness; moral correctness

tls:text.tls:line: Then the spirits listen to you

sense.def: the spirits; the divine creatures; divinity, spirit (typically belonging to or stemming from Heaven)

tls:text.tls:line: Then the spirits listen to you

sense.def: listen to; pay attention to (without necessarily approving of)

tls:text.tls:line: Then the spirits listen to you

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: Then the spirits listen to you

sense.def: NP-X is the subject of the deverbal Nab which is nominalised, resulting in topicalised NP 王之於國也

tls:text.tls:line: and they will assist you with great fortune."

sense.def: support N1 with N2, help N1 by bestowing N2 on N1; archaic (SHI)

tls:text.tls:line: and they will assist you with great fortune."

sense.def: you

tls:text.tls:line: and they will assist you with great fortune."

sense.def: big, abundant

tls:text.tls:line: No spiritual force is greater than the transforming Way;

sense.def: supernatural power, supernatural efficiency (mostly so in XUN as a technical term)

tls:text.tls:line: No spiritual force is greater than the transforming Way;

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:text.tls:line: No spiritual force is greater than the transforming Way;

sense.def: be greater than 甚大於 "be very much greater than"

tls:text.tls:line: No spiritual force is greater than the transforming Way;

sense.def: be educated and transformed by (superiors)化其上"be transformed by one's superiors"

tls:text.tls:line: No spiritual force is greater than the transforming Way;

sense.def: the (morally correct) Way; the proper non-substance-like abstract metaphysical principle ensuring that all is well in the world

tls:text.tls:line: good fortune lasts no longer than the period where there is no disaster.

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:text.tls:line: good fortune lasts no longer than the period where there is no disaster.

sense.def: better than N

tls:text.tls:line: good fortune lasts no longer than the period where there is no disaster.

sense.def: lack, be without; make do without; imply no (harm or loss); lack the support of (subordinates)

tls:text.tls:line: good fortune lasts no longer than the period where there is no disaster.

sense.def: disaster; disastrous fate, unhappy outcome; bad luck; sad fate

tls:text.tls:line: One may try reflecting (on something) all day,

sense.def: at one point, once in the past, on one occasion; in the past; in questions: ever

tls:text.tls:line: One may try reflecting (on something) all day,

sense.def: the whole day, all day long, day after day

tls:text.tls:line: One may try reflecting (on something) all day,

sense.def: 一日而三失伍 "within one day he managed three times to loose contact with his unit"

tls:text.tls:line: One may try reflecting (on something) all day,

sense.def: engage in reflection

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as what I have studied and learnt in a moment.

sense.def: the object which

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as what I have studied and learnt in a moment.

sense.def: aim to learn (a skill); learn to read (a text), recite and understand according to received interpretation (a text); devote oneself to, apply oneself to (cultural studies etc); learn from a teacher about (a subject)

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as what I have studied and learnt in a moment.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as what I have studied and learnt in a moment.

sense.def: npropostN1.adN2 N2 nominalised by 所: NP2 is nominalised by 所, and NP1 is the time of the VP that is nominalised 須臾之所學

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as what I have studied and learnt in a moment.

sense.def: be inferior (to another person) or (to something else); be lesser than; be not as good as

tls:text.tls:line: One may try standing on tip-toe and looking out for something,

sense.def: at one point, once in the past, on one occasion; in the past; in questions: ever

tls:text.tls:line: One may try standing on tip-toe and looking out for something,

sense.def: and at the same time, and on that occasion

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as the broad view one gets when one climbs high.

sense.def: be inferior (to another person) or (to something else); be lesser than; be not as good as

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as the broad view one gets when one climbs high.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as the broad view one gets when one climbs high.

sense.def: broad (learning)

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as the broad view one gets when one climbs high.

sense.def: NP1 indicates the placing in time of NP2 今之孝者

tls:text.tls:line: but that is not as good as the broad view one gets when one climbs high.

sense.def: what one sees, view

tls:text.tls:line: When one climbs high and waves,

sense.def: climb up, go up; also by flying: 豋天 "rise to Heaven".

tls:text.tls:line: When one climbs high and waves,

sense.def: and 謹而信"be diligent and trustworthy"

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that one's arms get longer,

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that the sound is more intense,

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that the sound is more intense,

sense.def: sign of comparative: increasingly, to a higher degree

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that the sound is more intense,

sense.def: be intense, be of high degree of intensity

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that he gets quicker of foot,

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that he gets quicker of foot,

sense.def: foot; feet

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that he gets quicker of foot,

sense.def: not at all; by no means; the fact is that not (perhaps this should be)

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that gets better at swimming,

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that gets better at swimming,

sense.def: not at all; by no means; the fact is that not (perhaps this should be)

tls:text.tls:line: it is not that gets better at swimming,

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to

tls:text.tls:line: From birth the gentleman is no different/remarkable,

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: From birth the gentleman is no different/remarkable,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:text.tls:line: From birth the gentleman is no different/remarkable,

sense.def: from birth; at birth 生而

tls:text.tls:line: but he is good at borrowing in relation to things.

sense.def: be a matter of S, depend on S, be because of S

tls:text.tls:line: but he is good at borrowing in relation to things.

sense.def: concrete thing; things; external things; kind of thing (Note incidentally that according to AC Graham this should probably be taken as a mass noun, so that 萬物 should literally become "myriad kinds of things"! 劉徽 on 九章算術 8.1: èr wù 二物 NOT: two items, but: two kinds of items, as in 二物者再程 "in the case of two kinds of items one measures twice". 物數 "number of kinds of things".

tls:text.tls:line: but one sees further;

sense.def: but

tls:text.tls:line: but one sees further;

sense.def: what one sees, view

tls:text.tls:line: but one sees further;

sense.def: be distant; be far away, be far off; be a long way; go a long way

tls:text.tls:line: but one sees further;

sense.def: pronoun an (often deverbal) abstract noun 虛者 "as for emptiness", 仁者 "as for benevolence".

tls:text.tls:line: if one shouts with the wind,

sense.def: wind; storm

tls:text.tls:line: if one shouts with the wind,

sense.def: and at the same time, and on that occasion

sense.def: but
